title: Minors in AI/ML at pesu
content: I'm a first yr CSE student here at PES,can I take up minors in AI/ML in 2nd year?

comments.body: Not in 2nd year, but later years you can take electives and special topics in AIML domains if you're interested. AIML is new degree by PESU so I don't have much idea about minors in AIML.

Probably (new department, we don't know), but why?

Minors cost a *lot* of money and you could just take the ML electives that the CS department offers.
